website_summaries.verdict: A popular and affordable option in easy-to-use tablet form that works well in most cases, but does come with some performance concerns.
pros: Convenient tablets that contain grease-fighting powerballs that also help remove tough food deposits
Will work on most dried-on foods
A good deal, as you get 85 tablets for the price
cons: Some users gripe about tablets not dissolving completely during the wash cycle
They also can leave a powdery residue on some dishes

customer_reviews.title: OLD OLD OLD or just water damaged and sold anyway......thanks Bezo !
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this product twice before and it was a good value, BUT (here is comes) , not this time ! Box arrived smashed ( not the shipping package, it was fine ) .... yes smashed. Not like it was crushed, but like it sat out in the rain for a few days and or in the dark wet corner of a warehouse for a couple of years. The product inside the package reflects this condition, squishy, crumbling and damp, nearly 1/3 of the individual packets are empty , sealed and puffed with air but empty ! Holy Moly this was a bad batch....should have been thrown away at the warehouse like I did with this box.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally Unfriendly Packaging
customer_reviews.text: These dishwasher pods are individually wrapped in plastic. I have never purchased this type of product with this type of packaging. Previous manufacturer's package the pods in one container. And yes, sometimes they become stuck together and need to be pulled apart but they still work. Don't the manufacturer's know that our planet is already inundated with disposable, one time use plastic products? For this reason I will not be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: RSS

customer_reviews.title: Bargain, but doesnt clean the tough stuff
customer_reviews.text: These are great value for your buck! The little red center was falling out of almost every single pack, but I just tossed one in with each cube and that worked. My only downfall was that it didnt get the gritty spots off of my silicone baking utensils and that is a big no-no for me. It also failed to remove all the stuck on stuff from my meatloaf pan. I'll probably repurchase just because of the bargain value, but I'll have to add in something for extra cleaning power as well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H

customer_reviews.title: I've bought and used the specific cleaner for my dishwasher thinking maybe it was dirty so that's why it isn't cleaning correctly
customer_reviews.text: I used to only use this brand. However I am not impressed for how it has been cleaning my dishes. I've bought and used the specific cleaner for my dishwasher thinking maybe it was dirty so that's why it isn't cleaning correctly. I use the Jet Dry to help my dishes come out with no spots. However nothing has worked. My dishes come out with white powder on them and I have to re-wash them or hand wash them. Plus a few of the pouches I opened to use were missing the red ball! I don't know if I got a bad batch but I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany C.

customer_reviews.title: Soap Residue
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I just opened the first of 2 boxes, so my return window has closed. As I removed the dishes from the dishwasher, I found white residue on them that appears to be undissolved soap particles. I make sure the water going in is at least the 120° as my water heater is set above 120° and I run the faucet to get the water hot. I wouldn't recommend this item, in fact it will more than likely hit the trash as I don't feel comfy even donating it. My loss 100%
customer_reviews.author: GrannyLu

customer_reviews.title: Every tablet is broken and powdery
customer_reviews.text: Never buying Finish again. First of all very wasteful that they are individually foil wrapped instead of dissolving plastic wrapped. Second, besides that you have to open each one, they all came broken and your hands get covered with the powder - so if you do buy these, make sure you open them over your soap receptacle in the dishwasher. Any Cascade pod a million times better!
customer_reviews.author: Long Live Prime!

customer_reviews.title: There is better out there so spend your money on another product.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I forgot that this product is the "pits". No, my dishwasher doesn't need to be cleaned. Yes, I've tried adding vinegar. But shouldn't a product be good enough that one shouldn't have to supplement it? It leaves a residue and tiny white flecks on my clear glass. So it is probably on all the load. I suppose the residue is undissolved detergent. Unless I can think of another use, I'll be throwing this out and replacing it within a couple of days. UCK!!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be Old Inventory
customer_reviews.text: The tablets were not in good shape at all. They appear to either be old or have gotten wet at some point. They crumble easily and were not in the same shape if I purchased the same at a local store. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: NJFamily

customer_reviews.title: Might be broken, but they still work
customer_reviews.text: These were a great price and do a great job of cleaning my dishes. I truly have no complaint when it comes to the efficacy of these. The only problem I have is that most of he tabs have been completely broken inside of the individuals packages. I have to open the tabs directly over the dispenser so that I don’t get detergent everywhere. Regardless, I’m happy with my clean dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bradley

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing better than these Powerballs!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried them all and this is the best for our dishwasher. For years we were happy with two other brands and switched between those two brands based on price. However over the years, the quality of those products appeared to change and thus we decided to try Finish Powerballs (based on the large amount of positive reviews). We have not looked back and all I can say is wow. Every time the dishwasher is used the glasses look perfect (never seemed to happen with other brands). We have been using them for over a year now and we will not buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: SK Wire

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Reliable Product--Avoid the Plastic Coated Dissolvable Tabs
customer_reviews.text: These work great. If you have hard water, couple the Powerball tabs with Finish Hardware Booster Lemon Sparkle additive and you will be amazed at how clear and sparkling your dishes are, especially the glassware. Steer clear of the plastic-encased, "wrapperless" Finish tablets. After one box of them our dishwasher developed a slimy coating that resisted vinegar and bleach. It took a lot of research and a lot of scrubbing to get rid of it. Looking back, if we had known Finish produced a dishwasher cleaner, we could have probably just used that.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Tower

customer_reviews.title: Wasteful packaging and product does not dissolve
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this product doesn't require individual packaging... Evidenced in the variety that comes with the tabs in a thin dissolvable film. So why would a company pollute the environment with individual foil packaging of some Finish tablets?? Also the red button (whatever that is about, it doesn't work) rarely dissolves and once my guests opened the dishwasher and there was slimy red goop on my glasses. Red dye, for what purpose---scary!! Finished with Finish!!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not as tasty as tide pods Add some truffle oil I have to buy truffle oil now. Thanks a lot bezos
customer_reviews.author: Christie Mamanna

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awful
customer_reviews.text: Even with the addition of the Finish Rinse Aid - and despite a very very light load - there's still residue from the packs caked all over my glasses. Some glasses have been sitting on the top rack for 3-4 washes in a row with zero improvement, and I've had to scrub the detergent off by hand in the sink. What's the point of these if I'm just wasting more time and water to achieve what Cascade pods have been doing efficiently in the past? I wanted to try Finish as a money-saving measure, but it has proved to be the complete opposite.
customer_reviews.author: Aggyness

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about getting these in subscribe and save but every tablet is broken and my dishes came out with a film on them. This was supposed to save me money bc I rarely purchase name brands. I’ll be switching back to grocery store brand pods now. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Elle R

customer_reviews.title: All in One
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. I haven't seen any residue on my plates since switching, especially plastic cups/plates for the kids. The All-In-One tablets are designed to be put in the bottom of your dishwasher from the start, not in the door that opens mid-way through the wash. Only 1 tablet is needed for a single load, so I also don't have to worry about a pre-wash.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this after my mom had a lot of success with similar products. Before, I've mostly used the liquid. I've used some gel packs before that did not work and i had to use two of them to get my dishes clean for my small dishwasher. I started off using two of these because of past experience. My dishes can out clean as could be! I was very happy. So one day i decided to use one pod thing. And i was pleasantly suprised that it worked very well. I'm very happy with this. I think i found the first dishwasher detergent I've ever been completely happy with
customer_reviews.author: JC114

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRICE HERE
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the best dishwasher detergent pacs available. first, Finish is recommended both by my plumber and by Bosch, the manufacturer of my dishwasher. Works great, and at 85 (yes, eighty five) for about ten bucks,i think this is a best buy!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Pfaus

customer_reviews.title: Individually Wrapped
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've experienced the enjoyment of not having to open a wrapper every time I run my dishwasher, I think I'll be leaving these individually wrapped tabs behind. It seems wasteful to have all of that extra wrapping. It cleans my dishes just fine and doesn't leave residue, however we know that's because these are powerful and dangerous chemicals. All of the eco friendly options I've tried tend to leave build-up/residue after 1 or two washings and I have to go back to Finish or Cascade.
customer_reviews.author: Family of Four

customer_reviews.title: Very weird inconsistent dissolving
customer_reviews.text: Just won't dissolve in our dishwasher. Went through the whole box and dishes got sorta clean but the tab would range from not dissolving at all to leaving a big grainy mess inside. Switched to a different major brand (maybe like a dollar more for this amount) and the problem went away...
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: 1 BOX = YEAR SUPPLY
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love these! I WILL NEVER buy any other kind. I have been using these for almost a full year now & when I mean these, I mean JUST this box. I have yet to buy another till now! I honestly do not use one in each wash, I split it up in two because my dishwasher does a fantastic job already! I live with just my boyfriend, however, I make each and every meal, so we pile up dishes VERY quick. This cuts through grease, caked up food, water marks, toothpaste (YES, toothpaste from people spitting on dishes in the sink.) Everything comes out clean, shiny & CLEAR! No weird buildup or residue left behind.
customer_reviews.author: LindseyChassM

customer_reviews.title: White residue on dishes
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know it is a bad batch or what, but it left our dishwasher and dishes with a white layer of residue, and I won’t go away with just rinsing it with water, you have to scrub pretty hard each dish in order to get it off. I’d rather wash the dishes by hand, than do triple the work getting the residue off!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Garza

customer_reviews.title: my favorite dishwasher packets ever
customer_reviews.text: These are, without a doubt, my favorite dishwasher packets ever! I bought these not expecting much since dishwasher packets are very hit or miss. Either they work really well or they just don't work and leave water stains all over my dishes. Well I was pleasantly surprised to see that they worked so well that I didn't have to rinse any dishes when the cycle was complete! I also loved that the tablets were in individually sealed packets. There was no worry that moisture or humidity would cause them to dissolve before use. This made me very happy, five stars to Finish!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Generally it cleans the dishes well but leaves a lot of water spots. Not sure if that's from the dishwasher or the detergent but I don't notice it this much with other brands. I will not buy again as I think there are better detergents out there
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: I've Stocked Up
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had reviewed this a very long time ago when I first started using them. They're better than I anticipated. It only takes one that I put in the bottom of the washer (I think they might get stuck in the door's holder contraption) and they work perfectly well in all washer and dry settings on my machine. However, I do get anything that looks really challenging off my pots and dishes before I load the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben

customer_reviews.title: Bought twice, both times they were damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I bought these and once again 2/3 of the tablets in the box are broken and crumbling. Neither box arrived with any damage so I'm wondering if they just sell the product that is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: danielle gill

customer_reviews.title: Great product, however many of then broken (Doesn't affect performance)
customer_reviews.text: These were just as expected, however many of these are broken within their individual foil packet. While this doesn't affect performance, it does push me to look for a local source next time I'm due.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Simple and clean!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried many different "dishwashing" detergents, both liquid and solid. it seems we constantly go back to the Finish all in 1 power ball. We never have any etching or residue left on the glasses, and it seems to always leave our dishes very clean with no residue left on them. I fully recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a simple and easy dish washing detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I don't like these. They leave a residue on my dishes & if a glass has an area sloped in such a way that some water pools there it is a guarantee that there are small black & white flecks (looks like undisolved sugar with a pinch of pepper mixed in) hanging out in that pooled water. I used Cascade for years but stopped being able to get them through subscribe & save so I switched to these after reading numerous positive reviews but unfortunately I just don't agree with those other reviewers. This product simply does not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: InNormal

customer_reviews.title: So much better than Cascade!
customer_reviews.text: Finish dishwasher detergent saved us from having to purchase a new dishwasher. We had been using Cascade liquid detergent for years and the dishes just were not getting clean anymore. Shopping around for a dishwasher I saw ads for Finish. I decided it was worth the try and I was very pleased to see CLEAN dishes after the first wash with Finish.
customer_reviews.author: Jeberama

customer_reviews.title: best value!!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the 85 pack for 13.39 in May of 2017. Believe it or not, I was down to the last one this morning! That's roughly 66 cents per month to use my dishwasher! I run my washer about 3 times a week! I would never find this kind of a deal in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Works great especially with harder water
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why we didn't try this brand sooner. We lived in an older home for a few years that did not have a dishwasher. We moved into a newer home that had one and did some research. Had seen some ads on TV for this brand, but never tried it. I think we used Cascade growing up, powder and gel, but I remember seeing spots, etc. One tablet works great for a full load on any setting. Have been really happy w/ these. I like that they are individually wrapped to keep them safe from little kids.
customer_reviews.author: R. Doug

customer_reviews.title: Don't clean well at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my regular brand was out of stock. Each dishwasher tab is unnecessarily individually wrapped. Most importantly, they do not clean well. I end up washing half my dishes by hand a second time because this product just does not get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love these Powerballs! My dishwasher is old and in desperate need of replacement. Using an off-brand detergent left me with streaky, dirty dishes. The Powerballs gets the dishes clean, despite my subpar dishwasher. Being able to just throw the pod in and start, no measuring or rinse aid required, is super convenient. I use Amazon Subscribe & Save for these and get the 15% off, making them extremely affordable. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Danica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best dishwasher detergent
customer_reviews.text: This Finish is the best dishwasher detergent we have used in a long time. It does what other brands say they do - it gets dishes clean without so much pre-rinsing. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Petersen Donna

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: My wife always bought cheaper detergent, these were to expensive for her. After I ran several loads through (using these and the Finish brand jet dry and 1 tab per load) she mentioned the glasses were looking a lot more clear. I figured out the big $20 box is about the same amount of wages as her cheap detergent because she had to fill both doors full. She's a believer now. Definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: The goon

customer_reviews.title: Same as in stores
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to leave the house during the pandemic. I ran out of dishwasher pods so bought these. They are the same ones I buy at the store, but they were delivered to my house.
customer_reviews.author: David Shefchik

customer_reviews.title: Streak Free Shine!
customer_reviews.text: This all in one deep clean by Finish works great! I originally purchased this because I wanted more bang for my buck, and I figured a 90 pack would last me for awhile. I have been used to most dishwasher cleaners leaving watermarks and streaks on my dishes. So I did not have high expectations. However, these work fantastic! No streaks or watermarks. All my dishes come out perfectly clean every time. I will be getting these from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Adria Rybarski

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by Dishwasher Repairman
customer_reviews.text: We have very hard water which was ruining our Bosch dishwasher. Our very competent repairman recommended ONLY this detergent. We have been using it regularly for years. We haven't needed to call for another repair since then.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Well!
customer_reviews.text: This dishwashing detergent seems to do the trick. I'll be honest, I've never had a dishwasher before, and these were recommended by my daughter. I bought the individually wrapped power balls. They clean great. The only thing I'd like better is if they weren't individually wrapped to create less waste.
customer_reviews.author: Fayette Terlouw

customer_reviews.title: Clean dishes for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a great Amazon price delivered right to my door. This is what is awesome about Amazon.com. Finish Powerball is one of the best dishwasher detergents I have found. My dishes was up so well and spot free without having to add anything additional. Even really dirty dishes (pots and pans) come clean with Finish Powerball. I run a days worth of dishes each night so at typically one load a day this box of powerballs will last me about 3 months, making it a great buy! Don't hesitate to give them a try, I have been really been satisfied with it's performance!
customer_reviews.author: Zaeryn 78

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great in our dishwasher! Before I purchased this product we were having a problem getting our dishes 'clean'. There was a residue still on the dishes - even after using all products recommended in our new dishwasher. At one time I tried the Finish 'Gel' pacs - actually I purchased them in error. Do NOT buy the gel pacs as they do not work and they also stick together!
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQzzz

customer_reviews.title: Basic Food Isn't Removed, Have to Re-wash Dishes
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this dishwasher detergent. After switching to this detergent because a natural brand wasn't completely cleansing our dishes, I discovered this one was worse. It failed to remove basics like salt and pepper from dishes, and didn't begin to clear dishes of items like banana even if the dish had been pre-rinsed. Each morning I have to rewash items that were in the dishwasher. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: My favorite dishwashing tabs
customer_reviews.text: I really love this dishwashing detergent. It does a great job of cleaning, and doesn't leave an odor on the dishes like some of the other better brands. I like that the tablets come individual wrapped, as I am always reaching for a dishwashing pod with damp hands, and the gel packs start sticking together pretty soon. That's a problem, since separating gel packs can cause them to rupture. These are individually wrapped, so they stay dry until you are ready for them. They clean the dishes very well, and I think they etch less than other brands (we have soft water).
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Individually Packaged
customer_reviews.text: Finish works great on my dishes and I love the results. My dishes come out clean and spot free. However, I was unaware before purchasing that each tablet is individually packaged (maybe I missed seeing this in the description or something), but I was disappointed in this feature for two reasons - 1) it just seems like unnecessary waste and 2) You have to unpackage the tablet before use...every time you do the dishes. If either of those reasons isn't a setback for you, then this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina U.

customer_reviews.title: they're fine and as I've said
customer_reviews.text: They do a serviceable job, though sometimes, dishes come out of the dishwasher with food residue still stuck on them and the glasses often have water spots on them. I've bought these boxes more than once, and there are always a few crushed tablets. Overall, they're fine and as I've said, I've bought them more than once, but it isn't the miracle cleaning solution for me that it seems to be for so many other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marchand

customer_reviews.title: Repairman recommended and customer approved!
customer_reviews.text: We always loved the Electrasol powder for use in our dishwasher and were loyal customers for years. Suddenly it became a challenge to find. When our dishwasher broke down, the repairman recommended we purchase these pods and simply toss them in the bottom of our machine. We have been loyal users ever since. I proved they worked when I recently used a Cascade pod I received as a sample. The result from using it: I had to rewash the entire load with my Finish due to food residue left behind. (Disclaimer: We rinse all dishes before placing them in our machine)
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars. I only gave it one star because i had to. What a waste. These tablets do not dissolve completely in my dishwasher. Whatever that red thing is in the middle just sits on the bottom and the white powdery leaves a trail from the soap compartment on the inside door of the dishwasher. My coffee mugs do not come clean, nor do my plates. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lindalindapool

customer_reviews.title: Love them, no more deposits on dishes or the inside of the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a fairly mundane item to review but these really work great. No more white deposits on the bottom of my stainless dishwasher and no more spilling powder. I have been using these for about 2 years now and would not go back to powders. Much easier than powders as well.
customer_reviews.author: dbze

customer_reviews.title: Mega size at small price - Nice
customer_reviews.text: Like the Mega pack - can't find them locally. These are great quality. I like that each pack is individually wrapped. Others are not individually wrapped and they get moist and stick together - ugh. These are nice and do a great job of getting my dishes clean
customer_reviews.author: Irvine7

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Does an excellent job with the dishes they always come out clean and clear. pretty good value for the money as well. would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no problems...
customer_reviews.text: After reading some negative reviews, I was surprised when this product arrived. I had accidentally ordered it. I have used this several times and have had no issues with white powder or residue as noted. I made sure I had plenty of rinse aid prior to use. Interesting to note, when a new dishwasher was recently installed (approximately 6 months ago), the technician informed me that most consumers do not know it is best to run the hot water (in the kitchen sink) just prior starting the dishwasher. I do this just long enough to assure the water is good and hot.
customer_reviews.author: Luvnmac

customer_reviews.title: That I will NOT be buying this product again!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this would be a good product BUT it turns out NOT to be! The dishes are NOT cleaned good - and I have doubled and even tripled the amount.
customer_reviews.author: Georgetta Maxine Kreis

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and value!
customer_reviews.text: These dishwasher tablets are an excellent buy when they go on sale. This detergent is just as good as some of the pricier brands. The dishes come out very clean and no streaks. We buy these all the time and have never been disappointed. I only wish they packaged them in a plastic box versus a cardboard box. We keep them under the sink until the box is empty and cardboard does not hold up as well. I keep dumping them into an old Cascade container and reusing that instead (I guess I am nitpicking here a bit) Either way, great product
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I like this b/c it's quick and easy. I use it frequently for light loads and I use it when I run out of gel dishwasher detergent. Gave some of mine to a friend to try and said it doesn't work in that particular machine, the "stuff" is still in the opened holder when cycle is finished. Will buy again but hesitate to recommend b/c of friend's experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean and shine is a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with a new Whirlpool dishwasher which was the first dish washing machine of my adult life, and then I discovered it was all about the detergent. Finding one what was formulated for the hard water we have in the northwestern US took a lot of trial and error and at one point I even tried a two component wash and shine approach but when I finally started using the finish powerball product I struck pay dirt. It produces clean shiny dishes, what more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: 85 or 90 Tablets??
customer_reviews.text: On the box quantity says 85 Tablets on the written description says 90 Tablets. Will be back after I get the order. I’m back, received item says on box 85 Tablets no where does it say 90 Tablets. Need to update your information!!!! I rated the quality of the product only not the quanity!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Missing 25 tablets from box
customer_reviews.text: You better count how many are in the box. The box was supposed to have 85 tablets but mine only had 60. That’s 25 missing tablets. Not happy with this scam.
customer_reviews.author: JTD

customer_reviews.title: Individually wrapped - Annoying and Wasteful
customer_reviews.text: These clean well but I was very surprised to find that each dishwasher tablet is individually wrapped. This creates a large, unnecessary amount of trash and is very wasteful, not to mention annoying when I have to do the dishes every day. Will not buy again for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Tank

customer_reviews.title: Will dye your dishwasher orange
customer_reviews.text: I used to love these for a spot free clean, but the formula apparently changed in early 2017. I just bought my last box ever. After months of struggling to clean this bizzare orange film forming on the inside of the dishwasher I finally figured out the source. I will stop buying finish tabs and their little red centers that no longer work, but cause huge messes.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Better for lightly soiled dishes.
customer_reviews.text: its a great dishwasher detergent however I prefer the Quantum line, I'm happy to have these though for very lightly soiled objects.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst detergent I've ever used. I have to put 3-4 tablets in and hope things get clean. Rarely is that hope fulfilled. I've had to rehash utensils every time because some residue is on everything. I've tried with just 2 tablets for the 2 cycles but dishes still stay dirty. I plan to just donate the box to a charity and buy something I know will work.
customer_reviews.author: Harper Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a few years and have had great results with the dishes coming out clean. I was lost for a while after the whole no phosphate thing, but have since found my new detergent. Our newer model dishwasher is the type that got rid of the exhaust vent and now requires jetdry in order to not leave everything soaking wet, but these also worked great on our last older style model with the vent that didn't need the jetdry.
customer_reviews.author: vk

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best dishwashing tablets on the market. It cleans the dishes well and has a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley M

customer_reviews.title: Individually Packaged Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This brand seems to really get my dishes clean. I like this brand and package best for 2 reasons: 1) no smell or residue on my dishes after and 2) they are packaged individually, so even though I keep them out of reach of the my children, if they were to get into the box, they are each packaged, making it harder to swallow the detergent
customer_reviews.author: LA Teacher

customer_reviews.title: The only stuff we'll use in our dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stuff for our dishwasher and the price on Amazon seems to be better than in the local stores. Definitely does a great job cleaning our dishes and we have well water which can be tricky. Each powerball comes individually wrapped. Good price and product. Using the All In 1 is the best that I have found on the market. I don't have to hand scrub food off the dishes like I do with some other types of detergent. I love having this delivered right to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of trash with non-disoving wrappers.
customer_reviews.text: These work with the dishwasher, but I don't like that they are individually wrapped. I have to open the single package every time and the box is card board. I prefer the Sam's club package where the outer packaging is plastic and the little tablets are pick 'em up and throw 'em in. I though about unwrapping them and putting them in my old plastic tub, but they are so fragile that once you unwrap them they start to fall apart like dish washer powder.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Var

customer_reviews.title: Works well but brittle.
customer_reviews.text: My dishes come out clean but each individually wrapped tab is quite brittle. I have to be careful loading it otherwise I get a powdery mess. Maybe dissolving easily is a plus and Price was great but I'm on the fence about reordering.
customer_reviews.author: freebird177

customer_reviews.title: Leaves spots, doesn't clean on first wash
customer_reviews.text: One box easily lasts 6+ months (if you're doing 3-4 cycles a week on average). However, doesn't clean well enough as other detergents. I have to really clean the dishes before I put them in the dish washer. Leaves spots and doesn't get off dried on food from dishes. Sometimes I have to run the dish washer a second time to get a good clean or wash the items not fully cleaned by hand afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Every package has been crushed
customer_reviews.text: This item came damaged and unsure if performance is being effected. Every single capsule has been crushed into powder.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: love having this mega pack
customer_reviews.text: love having this mega pack, so I don't feel like I have to keep buying this stuff as part of a weekly item. love being stocked up on it and these seem to work really well. the dishes come out looking clean and streak free. will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: INmomof2

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a penny pincher to the extreme. So, she has figured this out, they are a little cheaper per tablet by ordering them from Amazon as apposed to buying them at Sam's. They seam to work fine. My wife never rinses anything before putting it in the dishwasher regardless of my constant nagging of telling her to. But....... she's actually in the right, because we very seldom have dishes that didn't come clean. Been using them since we got a dishwasher and have been satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Jake Green

customer_reviews.title: this is the best product out there
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little picky about cleaning products; this is the best product out there, for now, It leaves no streaks, is powerful despite the changes in detergent chemical composition made several years ago, and is a great deal per load in comparison to similar products. Consumer reports, and every other mom and pop blog talk about how great it is. I've been using it for tour years now and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin M. Elissetche

customer_reviews.title: SPOTS SPOTS EVERY WHERE!!!
customer_reviews.text: my dishwasher is brand new ...but this product works like it's been used already by others...no cleaning power at all and SPOTS ....it's as if I just splashed water on my dishes and said be done with it!!! Sent there is none. value for my money...DON'T MAKE ME LAUGH !!! I want my money back you can keep this crapoloa !!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss W. L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: The only brand I buy!
customer_reviews.text: I run my dishwasher at least once a day (family of 5 here!) and Finish is the only brand of dishwasher packs I will buy. I've tried Cascade and store-brands, but Finish always seems to do the best job. I never have residue or anything weird left on my dishes! And they're super affordable - I prefer buying them in the bulk "Mega pack" so I don't have to worry about running out unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Dishes are clean.
customer_reviews.text: Dishes are clean. I didn’t have to go to the store during the Covid-19 pandemic. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: AmberD

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Usually last about a year just 2 people in house run machine 3 times a week always comes in good conditikn
customer_reviews.author: Secretly sweet

customer_reviews.title: Note to self, it's not the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: We had bought a new dishwasher that recommended Cascade. It had the automatic dispenser for liquid so used as prescribed. Ugh! The dishes were not getting clean and had a grit on the glasses. Also noticed the inside of the dishwasher was looking filthy. I changed to Finish and what a difference. Although I'm not using the automatic liquid dispenser I couldn't be happier. My dishwasher looks clean again and to boot, it's a less expensive product. Bravo Finish!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Joseph Moreau

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT gell pods
customer_reviews.text: They do work but, be very careful the drying agent center doesn’t fall out! Children and pets could be poisoned!
customer_reviews.author: JBUICE

customer_reviews.title: Finish is the best - don't waste time with other brands
customer_reviews.text: I have used several other brands of dishwasher detergents ranging from the time tested "big name" labels to the newer, more eco-friendly all natural versions and I keep coming back to the Finish brand. We very rarely have a situation where we pull something out of the dishwasher and have to rewash it. Keeps glassware streak free. Amazon's prices on this product are insanely cheap and usually much better than Target or other big name stores.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Many tabs are missing even it's still wrapped.
customer_reviews.text: The tabs are missing, even they are still wrapped. Here is my 3rd order, but it should be last one for this product. It does the job and the dish are clean, but it left much of the powder in the machine compared to other Finish's product.
customer_reviews.author: Surasit

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Each cube of product is in a wrapper. When opened for use, 9/10 of the little cube are cracked. and broken and a bunch of dust falls out when opening them. I dont find its washing ability is good either. Theres often product caked on the dispenser even after a Pots/Pans cycle. Its also stained the stainless steel above the disprenser.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Biddy

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Cleans dishes very well without pre-scrubbing or rinsing, and I don't have a high end dishwasher! Top rated dishwasher detergent by Consumer Reports. One of the pink power balls came off. Not really a big deal, since I just put in the dispenser cup with the rest of the tab.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderdog

customer_reviews.title: No more gunk, no more smell!
customer_reviews.text: Our new dishwasher was consistently producing a nasty pink fungus-like substance that was horrible to clean out, and made the kitchen smell awful. We would have to take the whole thing apart and soak and scrub all the parts individually. Was using cascade powder that my repairman recommended. I tried these and the difference is amazing. No more pink gunk, dishes are generally clean, no bad smell, easy to use and portion. I love them. Four stars only because once in awhile they don't dissolve, but I haven't had that problem often.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Arrived all cracked, my dishes aren’t super clean either. Will switch up next time. Been using this product for 3+ years, not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Tjr

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a repairman
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher service tech told me these are the only ones to use in any dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Branden D Stone

customer_reviews.title: Works well for your dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do a good job washing your dishes. Don't really notice a scent. Good price .
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly and a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have six kids who couldn't pre-wash a plate if their lives depended on it and a dishwasher that is less than perfect. If I don't use quality detergent, my dishes don't get clean. End of story. This product meets my heavy demands and at a great price. No prewash necessary and I rarely have to wash a dish more than once. Even takes care of the pots and pans perfectly. I always keep it stocked in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Not spot on, and thats a good thing
customer_reviews.text: Its truly the only one we will use, no spots no grit or left over crud . We have a Whirlpool quiet partner 2 dishwasher that isn't up to par but we never ever have spots. I liked ordering it thru Amazon as it was the same price once I added the .50 coupon and did the 2 day delivery. Dave Steffen Traditions Entertainment Like us on Facebook
customer_reviews.author: Dad who reviews

customer_reviews.title: These have changed... Now leaves an awful taste on plastic item.
customer_reviews.text: We have used finish for several years and were happy. We reordered from Amazon for the 3rd time in as many years recently. They have changed and the scent penetrates plastic. It leaves a horrible taste on plastic glasses. I had a few of the previous years product and the old ones have little smell. The new ones are overpowering when you open the package. This is awful. Are others having the same issue? Were some of these defective? I will have to throw these out. I can't imagine this is healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: stick with the liquid
customer_reviews.text: finish make a liquid version that is superior- these cubes are problematic on many fronts
customer_reviews.author: Amson

customer_reviews.title: These make my dishes the cleanest I have ever seen, Ever.
customer_reviews.text: These make my dishes SO CLEAN!!! I'll hand wash silverware sometimes, because I don't feel like running the dishwasher, and they'll always end up with little spots on them, because they're stainless steel. But when I put them in the dishwasher with one of these tabs, everything comes out so much cleaner, and wonderful. I just love these so much.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend doing that
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday and had to try it out right away. On the box it says you can skip rinsing and just scrape the dishes. I wouldn't recommend doing that. Maybe over time and continued use I'll find that it has superior powers but, right now, while it does a good job, it isn't any better than the generic brand I've been buying at Aldi's. Still, I haven't given it the test of time and maybe I'll live to see my dishes and glasses sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job for the price -- most of the time
customer_reviews.text: Ninety percent of the time this detergent does a good job on my dishes, but sometimes the product doesn't seem to completely rinse off my glasses, leaving them feeling kind of gritty. I don't have that problem when I used Cascade Complete, but this is considerably cheaper. Most of the time it's worth it, but every now and then I have to re-wash a load.
customer_reviews.author: Cascade book lover

customer_reviews.title: Cleans
customer_reviews.text: With all the recent scares of kids eating dishwashing pods, I wanted something less obvious. Was definitely surprised at how well these work on tough stains. My wife recently made a roast which had a lot of sauce. Usually I was try and pre soak the dishes before loading. Tried these out without the presoak and the pan came out clean. No streams, no residue, and looked great. Will buy again once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: I'm FINISHed looking for the best dishwasher detergent because I've found it.
customer_reviews.text: We switched to Finish when I was pregnant and the smell of our old dishwasher detergent made me want to vomit. Somehow it still does and Finish does such a great job that we haven't looked back. I like that there is virtually no waste with these, although the silver foil packaging could probably be reduced somehow. I know it's there to protect from moisture, and the cardboard box can't protect from that, so not sure what the solution is.
customer_reviews.author: C. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Dishwasher Soap!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Dish washing soap out there. Get's things clean every time. Hint: If you are having trouble with the powder pack "melting"; run hot water through your sink first before starting the dishwasher. This is a good idea no matter what soap or what dishwasher you have as the initial water getting into the machine will already be "hot" before the dishwasher "heats" it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: There's a good chance you could get a mouth full of detergent ...
customer_reviews.text: This product leaves a lot of white powdery residue on the dishes if you don't have/select the sani-rinse option on your dishwasher. There's a good chance you could get a mouth full of detergent if you go to get a glass of water in the dark :). It took us a couple of runs to figure out how to get the dishwasher to rinse well but now we are happy with these. Good price, good packaging and a large quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results, every time. I know i sound like a commercial or one of those bots that writes reviews, but we use this at home and i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brody Barker

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps less attractive to children.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to clean as well as the other brands I use. Here is what I like. The PODS have been known to be put in the mouths of children who think it is a candy, etc. Many ER visits in regard to this. This Finish product is individually wrapped in paper and it does not look like a pod at all. I feel like a child would less likely take it out of the box since each one is wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyberg

product_meta.title: Finish - All in 1-85ct - Dishwasher Detergent - Powerball - Dishwashing Tablets - Dish Tabs - Fresh Scent
product_meta.description: Size:85 Count (Pack of 1)Thanks to a unique and powerful dishwashing technology, Finish Powerball Tabs Dishwasher Detergent tablets give you an amazing clean and Finish Jet-Dry shine every time - which means you will never have to re-wash your dishes again in your dishwasher.
feature_bullets: Finish Powerball Tabs are 3X concentrated cleaning power of regular Finish powder dosage
Pre-soaking Powerball scrubs away dried-on food residues
Jet Dry dishwasher rinse aid eliminates spots and film for sparkling shine
Easy-to-use, pre-measured dishwasher tablets with clean, fresh scent
